title: Citi Latin America Recognized with 27 "World's Best Internet Banks in Latin America 2012 Awards" by Global Finance Magazine
summary: Miami, Florida - Citi has been recognized by Global Finance magazine in the First Round of the "World's Best Internet Banks in Latin America 2012" competition with seven of the nine regional sub-category awards and 19 country awards in the Best Corporate/Institutional Internet Banks category.
tag-1: Citi Latin America Recognized with 27 "World's Best Internet Banks in Latin America 2012 Awards" by Global Finance Magazine
tag-3: Miami, Florida – Citi has been recognized by Global Finance magazine in the First Round of the "World's Best Internet Banks in Latin America 2012" competition with seven of the nine regional sub-category awards and 19 country awards in the Best Corporate/Institutional Internet Banks category.
tag-4: Citi Latin America received awards in the following sub-categories: "Best Investment Management Services," and "Best Online Cash Management," for the fourth consecutive year, in addition to "Best Trade Finance Services," "Best Integrated Corporate Bank Site," "Best Information Security Initiatives," "Best in Mobile Banking" and "Best in Online Treasury Services" (Banamex). In addition, Citi also won "Best Information Security Initiatives" (Banamex) in the regional category of Best Consumer Internet Banks.
tag-5: Citi also won the "Best Corporate/Institutional Internet Banks Award" country category in Argentina, Bahamas, Barbados, Colombia, Costa Rica, Dominican Republic, Ecuador, El Salvador, Guatemala, Haiti, Honduras, Mexico (Banamex), Panama, Paraguay, Peru, Puerto Rico, Trinidad & Tobago, Uruguay and Venezuela.
tag-6: "Citi's continued recognition in these prestigious awards, both at regional and country levels, distinguish our sustained efforts for delivering the best solutions to our clients," said Fernando Iraola, Latin America and Mexico Region Head, Citi Transaction Services. "We are very proud of these recognitions and continue being committed to bringing the best corporate and institutional internet capabilities to our clients in the region."
